talents.name: Adrenaline rush
talents.effects: Use up to two rest dice immediately.

talents.name: Fast learner
talents.effects: Whenever you roll a cumulative check, add +1 to each result.

talents.name: Levitation
talents.effects: You can hover above solid ground.

talents.name: Loot goblin
talents.effects: When you obtain a special item (based on GMs discretion), gain 2 dice to add to any combination of rolls. The dice correspond to the type of dice used in the respective checks.

talents.name: Pirates reputation
talents.effects: Choose a striking physical feature like an eyepatch, scars or tattoos. Brandish your chosen feature to immediately gather interest and attention.

talents.name: Skill mastery
talents.prerequisites: A skill with +4 training, no more than 1 skill with +5 training
talents.effects: Choose a skill with +4 training, increase it to +5. You can learn this talent two times.

talents.name: Spidersense
talents.effects: The GM warns you of surprises but all details are left out.

talents.name: Thick hide
talents.effects: Gain +1 armor while not wearing armor.

talents.name: Tremorsense
talents.effects: You sense vibrations in the earth and do not need your eyes to see, as long as your feet touch the ground.

talents.name: Unending
talents.effects: If an effect or enemy would finish you while have the dying status, ignore the first time it happens.

talents.name: Vitality plus
talents.effects: Gain +2 HP. You can learn this talent up to 5 times.

talents.name: Armor shred
talents.effects: When hitting an enemy with a melee attack, gain new options: $G$deal only partial damage but reduce the targets armor by 1$G$ | $Y$deal no damage but reduce the targets armor by 1$Y$.

talents.name: Backstab
talents.effects: Deal +3 damage to distracted or surprised targets.

talents.name: Battle focus
talents.effects: Gain +1 to melee checks and +1 armor as long as you are in battle.

talents.name: Bloodbath
talents.effects: Bathe in blood to gain 2d6 shielded HP until your next rest.

talents.name: Brawler
talents.effects: Use your full ST for melee checks when fighting unarmed.

talents.name: Bring it on
talents.effects: While you fight outnumbered, gain +1 armor.

talents.name: Bull rush
talents.effects: Successful attacks knock your target to the ground. Conflicted checks offer a choice of dealing partial damage or no damage but a knockdown.

talents.name: Cannonfire
talents.effects: Gain +2 to ranged combat checks with stationary firearms and cannons.

talents.name: Careless fighting
talents.effects: Gain +2 on your next melee check but gain conflict regardless of the result.

talents.name: Charge with me
talents.effects: If you enter battle first and ahead of your allies, they gain +1 to all combat checks during battle.

talents.name: Constrictor
talents.effects: You only need to use one hand to restrict or grapple creatures.

talents.name: Critical attacks
talents.effects: If you roll a 15 or higher on your combat checks, deal +3 damage.

talents.name: Dual wield
talents.effects: When attacking with two light weapons use only the higher bonus for the combat check but gain the effects of both weapons.

talents.name: Ethereal attacks
talents.effects: Your attacks can hits ethereal beings, like ghosts, wraiths, etc.

talents.name: Fair fight
talents.effects: While in single combat, gain +1 die to all combat checks.

talents.name: Flexible armor
talents.effects: Reduce any penalty of wearing armor by 1.

talents.name: Flying weapon
talents.effects: You can throw your weapons by rolling a melee combat check.
